abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; several databases of Middle Eastern archaeological artifacts, including Cuneiform Digital Library Initiative and Ur Online, reveal insights both into history of objects and lives of researchers who collected them.

keywords.value: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Databases are shedding light on the ancient rulers as well as the Europeans and Americans who dug at historic sites.
snippet: Databases are shedding light on the ancient rulers as well as the Europeans and Americans who dug at historic sites....

headline.main: Digital Troves, Providing Insights and Reuniting Antiquities
headline.print_headline: Tales of Old Empires and Adventurers, Now in Digital Troves
